attributes.action: Vote ONLY WTO or PMs deal. NO REMAIN under ANY circumstances!
attributes.additional_details: We leave 29.03.2019 but if MPs force VERY short delay on article 50 ( 2 months max) then ANY Remain is still NOT an option! People gave government clear democratic mandate to LEAVE EU.
attributes.background: 2016 referendum was IN or OUT of EU. Democratic result was LEAVE. REMAIN is allready OFF table.
